anime.description: * Based on http://anidb.net/cr29399 [Aihara Hiroyuki] and http://anidb.net/cr43999 [Adachi Nami]`s Usagi-chan to Yukidaruma (うさぎちゃんとゆきだるま) picture book. The main character is a little girl rabbit called Anzu, who lives in a lush green forest. She just loves playing in the forests and meadows. Note: Participated in 2016`s MIFA (Marche international du film d`animation) animation market, which is run by and concurrently with the Annecy International Animation Film Festival.
